channel.title: [508] Sunscape v1.31- z508 [508]
channel.description:
Made by: Freesunfury/Sunny++ same person.
If you see this on any other community and they have not given credits its fake. You can even see in the server files.
Server base - Z508
Download Link - http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?wmizjekab0o
Features
* Basic Censoring System, in my new server it will definitely change. * Trade flawless no trade limit i never wanted one in SunScape * Chisel on Boxsets a lot of them * I have cleaned the code should look somewhat clean. Not all of it. * Stat menus Perfect * All dups fixed. * Teletabs all work * Purple Sweets Perfect * Flood Protection * All Bank Booths work correctly + G.E Collect * Ring of Stone * Dual LD + HD * Multiway combat with interfaces just need 1 more fix not added but codes in there. * Anti flooding just need to test it more. * Friends List + Ignores just need them to save the names * near Perfect banking has notes and everything else , just need tabs. * Pickpocketing/Thieving just need failing. * Wilderness ditch + interface just small jumping bug. * Level up messages changed Z508's just need skill icons. * PVNPC Combat much better than Z508's * Players cannot use "MOD" "ADMIN" or "OWNER" in there name. Or Invalid characters. * I have deleted codeusa package didn't need it, and i didn't like the extra clicking. * Has leetchecker uses rs graphs good program was going to use for my G.E would be very cool * All Z508 Features * Very Stable, and not glitchy. Like most other releases.
The server is very stable, can hold a decent amount of players. If you download you will notice that the server is changed packaging and has [Game Engine] i was going to redo some of the framework.

item.title: [508] Sunscape v1.31- z508 [508]
item.dc:creator: @m0ther_hm0 m0ther hm0
item.description:
@m0ther_hm0 wrote:

Made by: Freesunfury/Sunny++ same person.

If you see this on any other community and they have not given credits its fake. You can even see in the server files.

Server base - Z508

Download Link - http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?wmizjekab0o

Features

* Basic Censoring System, in my new server it will definitely change.
* Trade flawless no trade limit i never wanted one in SunScape
* Chisel on Boxsets a lot of them
* I have cleaned the code should look somewhat clean. Not all of it.
* Stat menus Perfect
* All dups fixed.
* Teletabs all work
* Purple Sweets Perfect
* Flood Protection
* All Bank Booths work correctly + G.E Collect
* Ring of Stone
* Dual LD + HD
* Multiway combat with interfaces just need 1 more fix not added but codes in there.
* Anti flooding just need to test it more.
* Friends List + Ignores just need them to save the names
* near Perfect banking has notes and everything else , just need tabs.
* Pickpocketing/Thieving just need failing.
* Wilderness ditch + interface just small jumping bug.
* Level up messages changed Z508's just need skill icons.
* PVNPC Combat much better than Z508's
* Players cannot use "MOD" "ADMIN" or "OWNER" in there name. Or Invalid characters.
* I have deleted codeusa package didn't need it, and i didn't like the extra clicking.
* Has leetchecker uses rs graphs good program was going to use for my G.E would be very cool
* All Z508 Features
* Very Stable, and not glitchy. Like most other releases.

The server is very stable, can hold a decent amount of players.
If you download you will notice that the server is changed packaging and has [Game Engine] i was going to redo some of the framework.

Read full topic
